programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: Former US Supreme Court Justice Anthony Kennedy. Philanthropist and financier David Rubenstein uncovers inside stories from the most influential minds in business.

programme.title: LEADERS with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Francine talks with Franklin Templeton CEO Jenny Johnson about how to steer a $1.6 trillion business amid the rise of AI, shifting politics and booming private markets.

programme.title: The Mishal Husain Show
programme.desc: Mishal Husain, one of Britain's best interviewers, brings her signature blend of curiosity and tenacity to weekly conversations with world leaders, business titans and cultural icons.

programme.title: The Mishal Husain Show
programme.desc: Mishal Husain, one of Britain's best interviewers, brings her signature blend of curiosity and tenacity to weekly conversations with world leaders, business titans and cultural icons.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Jason Kelly heads to Maranello, Italy, to speak with Ferrari's leadership about the coming regulatory changes for Formula 1 and how Ferrari's racing technology informs the road cars of today.

programme.title: Bloomberg Originals
programme.desc: Exploring every angle of climate change, technology, finance, sports and beyond, Bloomberg Originals is business as you've never seen it.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: A weekly program telling the stories of capitalism from around the world, hosted by David Westin in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Bloomberg Open Interest with Matt Miller and Dani Burger - delivers the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg ETF IQ
programme.desc: Bloomberg ETF IQ focuses on the opportunities, risks and trends tied to the trillions of dollars in the global exchange traded funds industry. Hosted by Matt Miller, Scarlet Fu and Eric Balchunas.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld break down the day's top market-moving stories and trading action around the closing bell.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world.
